caption:
The photograph features an elderly man standing in front of a roughly textured, peeling white wall. He is slightly off-center in the frame, positioned slightly to the left, facing towards the camera with a gentle, serene expression. The man has wispy white hair and a neat mustache. He is dressed in a yellow-beige striped button-down shirt and light-colored pants, and stands with his hands clasped in front of him.

To the right in the background, against the white wall, there's also a vintage Coca-Cola advertisement poster featuring an image of a Coca-Cola bottle and the words "Drink Coca-Cola SIGN OF GOOD TASTE." The wall itself appears somewhat worn, with patches where the white paint has peeled off, revealing what seems to be a darker surface underneath. The ground at the bottom of the image is a dark, dirt-covered surface, enhancing the rustic look of the setting.
title: Operator of grocery and post office at Nixon, Pyramid Lake Indian Reservation
